REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2489 reute d f BC-AUTODESK-<ACAD.O>-SEL 06-02 0042

TEXT.TITLE: AUTODESK <ACAD.O> SELLS STOCK
TEXT.BODY: Autodesk Inc said it made an underwritten public offering of 2,640,836 common shares at 24 dlrs per share. The company said it sold 2.5 mln shares and the rest were sold by stockholders. Reuter
